description: rectangular-shaped box bank in blue, gold and black; triangular hanger on top rear; slot on top; flips open with a hinge; scenes of Holland on sides and back; Dutch writing on all 4 sides; gold 6-pointed star, center front; fabric lines coin slot
inscription:
Inscriptions

rear bottom, in black: [BEKKERS DORDRECHT (HOLLAND)]; center rear, in black: [K.L.M. copyright]; on bottom, incised: [949]
title: "Het Apeldoornsche Bosch" still bank
